tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (NP (NP (NNS Smiles)) (, ,) (NP (NNS laughers)) (CC and) (NP (NN joy))) (VP (VBP are) (ADJP (JJ simple) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB spell))))))) (CC but) (FRAG (NP (RB not) (JJ necessary)) (ADJP (JJ easy) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB get)))))) (. .)))
